inn1.comm: Brent starts outside off and gets a bit of away movement, left alone
again on the spot moves away, plays inside that leaving alone
thats wide down the leg side
well forward, defends from the front foot
thats too short, pulls well from the front foot
wide down leg side
well forward, defends to the off
ends the over well, on line and length, defends to the off
good length ball into the middle, tries to push it and got inside edge to pads.
short of good length ball just outside the off, defended towards covers for no run.
good length ball just outside the off, left alone.
good length ball just outside the off, left alone.
fuller length ball just outside the off, pushed to covers for no run.
fuller length ball just outside the off, pushed to covers for no run.
good length ball just outside the off, left alone.
good length ball just outside the off, left alone.
short of good length ball just outside the off, cuts it wide of point for three runs.
good length ball into the off, defended it towards mid-off for no run.
fuller length ball just outside the off, slower one, punches it to covers for no run.
good length ball into the off, defended towards mid-off for no run.
fuller length ball just outside the off, drives it towards backward point and Williams half stopped it for a single.
good length ball outside the off, left alone.
good length ball into the off, steered it wide of backward point
good length ball just outside the off, left alone.
good length ball just outside the off, pushed towards point for no run.
good length ball into the middle, turns it towards mid-wicket for a single.
wide down the legs, left alone.
good length ball into the off, defended towards covers for no run.
good length ball on the middle, turns it to square leg for no run.
good length ball just outside the off, defended back to bowler.
good length ball just outside the off, cuts it wide of point for three runs.
fuller length ball just outside the off, punches it to mid-off for no run
good length ball just outside the off, comes out of the track and punches it wide of mid-off for FOUR!
outside off, touch short, cuts to Williams and for the second time he is beaten by the bounce at backward point
well forward on the off, stroked into the covers
outside off, touch short, back and defends to the off
gets back and cuts that firmly, out the middle and no chance for anyone to misfield
gets back working to the leg side, off the pads behind square
all defensive to the off
just on the off, does not get to far forawrd, dabs to the off
slower ball that is very short outside off, pulls that well to deep midwicket
too short again, this leg side and is hooked away to midwicket
drops another one short, unlike Brent, that is hooked well, but the square leg gets some fingers to it and saves two runs
better ball, pushed across the left hander who defends to the off
just outside off, good length, Smith strokes that to the off
touch short, gets across on the back foot, cuts, but not timed to cover point
shuffles down the pitch and to the leg, drives, mistimed just wide of mid-on
line and length has Bodi defending to the off
outside off, too short, mistimes the cut to the off
outside off, width, goes after that, foot down the pitch, drives away from the body, edge, Taylor at slip is too slow as that nearly takes his head off
good start, line and length angled across bodi who also defends well away from the body
gets well forward, stroked to the gap at cover
leg stump line, dabs to the on side
moves across to the off, picks up the ball just short of length, lofted well over wide long-on, good clean hit from the left hander

gets well forward on the off, pushes at one leaving him, edges, Taibu does well to take that standing up before appealing and then setting off on a celebration run to square leg, Bodi almost with a gulity look in the eyes, sees the finger of fate go up
Morkel up the order as the pinch hitter starts off all defensive, runs that back to the bowler from the front foot
on the legs, moving to the off, defends back to the on side
just too full to man in form, crashes the cover drive between cover point and cover
thats very wide outside off, even though Smith made room to the leg, that nearly went to first slip
gets well forward, gently drives into the covers
makes room to the on side again, gets a shortish ball angles across him, ends up choping the cut to the third man
just on the off, short of length, pushes from the back foot towards the cover
well forward on line, gets the front pad too far across, thuds into the pad, but pitched outside leg
outside off, touch short, gently runs that towards third man
outside off, just short of length, stands tall and crashes a drive on the up past cover point, powerful shot, and thats what he has been sent in to do
drives firmly again outside the off, but straight at extra cover
shorter ball on the legs, stands tall in the crease and punches to midwicket
just outside off, cuts close to the body, runs that to the long leg
outside off, touch wide and cut to the long leg
drives from outside off, but insurance in place on the cover boundary
outside off, shortish, back to cut, but too close, ends up at his feet
well forward on the off, all defensive
tries to cut again, but too close to get any power on the ball, rolls away to gully
on the back foot, defends to the off
gets well forward on the drive, inside edge, that nearly rolls back onto the stumps
leg stump line, looks to work that to the on side, leading edge gently to the on side
leg side, back, turned neatly off the legs to fine leg
well forward on the off, being contained a bit by Zimbabwe is Morkel
no width on the off, defends to the off
does get enough width on the off, drives well to and wide of the sweeper
back to line and length and defended
slower ball after a delay with a stuck sightscreen, Smith drives firmly at the width, gets the edge and Taylor this time gets two hands to a low catch at a wide slip
gets welcomed to the crease by a very wide ball, and rightly called
touch too wide outside off, left alone
well forward on the off, gets all defensive
great shot, just overpitched, gets forward, gently leans into the straight drive and timed away inside mid-off
this time he drives firmly and wide of the mid-off, that one does race off the bat
touch short of length, on line, and is defended down the pitch
just too straight as he stands in the crease and nudges that to the leg side
line and length, keeper up, defends to the off
staying with a good line and length, respectful defence down the pitch
touch short but on line, is defended from the back foot
just wide of the off, not full enough to drive, left alone
too straight this time, half forward and worked off the pads to fine leg
left alone outside off, taibu fumbles that one standing up
left alone outside off
third ball in a row, left alone outside off
gets bat to this, but defends to the off
just on the off, has to play at that, rolls it away on the off
touch short, cuts, not timed to gully
drives to the off, just over pitched, sweeper gets round
all defensive again
just on the off, maintain a good length and brings out the forward defence
leg stump line, on the front foot, has to get the bat round the front pad, edges down to fine leg, no  no edge that, umpires gives leg byes
line and length, defends to the off
outside off, thats short and wide, foot down the pitch and cuts firmly from the front foot, no one moved as that flashes to the point boundary
short, straight, slow, whips that round to long leg from the back foot
short again, thats heaved over midwicket from the front foot
slower ball, but better than that it is full, stroked from the crease wide of mid-on
slight width, drives but can not find the gap at cover
half forward looking to work the straight line to the on side, straight at midwicket
slight width, touch short, de Villiers misses out on runs as he forces off the back foot towards cover
has been keeping a good line and keeping the pressure on Morkel who defends from length
waits for any width, does not get it, defends to cover
again line and length brings out the forward defence
patience pays off for Morkel, gets the short ball on the legs and hooks away between midwicket and mid-on
line and length, firmly stroked into the covers
well forward on the off, does get the foot well across, strokes through the line wide of cover
defends to the on side
defends gently from the crease towards the off, no urgency needed from de Villiers as yet
gets forward, works that from line to the on side
short ball, Morkel forces the cut, bottom edge to the off, looks like he now wants to get moving
and that he does, that is crashed from the front foot over the bowlers head, one bounce straight boundary
again drives firmly, this time along the ground, hits it straight at extra cover
leg stump line, worked off the legs to deep midwicket
leg stump again, worked nudging behind square on the leg side
flicks that to deep square leg, great diving stop by the man coming along the boundary, returns to taibu who crashes into the stumps and a grunt from him as he demolishes them
forward defends to the off
gently forward, stroked down the ground to deep mid-off
well forward on the leg side, strokes that past the midwicket for a gentle walk through
Captain brings himself on and starts well on length
nice flight as that loops onto length, defends
gets forward and defends gently pushing to the off
loops it at the left hander who responds with a forward defence
good over so far, no width or shortness, defends to the off, can he maintain that length
opps drags that down and punched down the ground but poor fielding at wide midwicket and on the boundary gives away four
spin at both ends with the 19 year old showing a lot of maturity
well forward and defends, ball not coming onto the bat now, Morkel needs to adjust
well forward decides it is easier to stand at the bowlers end, rotates the strike
flighted and turns nicely into the defensive bat
thats just too full and de Villiers caresses that through the covers
full again, good line has him stroking it down the ground
uses his feet he drives that down the ground to long-on
all defensive from the front foot
firmly driven into the covers
quicker ball, touch short, plays across the line and the inside edge saves a huge lbw appeal
looks to get well forward early, then defends from there
yes, on that front foot early again, this time slightly fuller so drives down the ground to long off
all defensive and he is on that front foot early
well forward, defends to the off
foot is out early, this ball is looped up and then looped out as he smashes that big, high up into the stands at wide long on
follows the 6 up with a front foot dab to the off
drives neatly straight, but some neat fielding from the bowler as well
drives again, this time wide of the bowler, runs away to long off
leg stump line, nudges neatly into the gap at midwicket
all defensive from the front foot
again, big stride in, not there to be hit, defends
finds the gap at midwicket as he works that to the on side
drives straight at cover
just on the legs and nudged to the on side
too short and is slapped from the back foot past point
flighted up, just a touch short and that is flat batted over midwicket, never got higher that about 2 meters
pulls the short one again, along the ground, deep midwicket does well
oh dear, short again, easy put away at square leg
better length and line, stroked back at the bowler from the front foot
big short long hop and that send high over midwicket for his 50 in 43 balls
defends from that big forward push to cover
foot goes down and then a touch full is firmly driven to long off
fired in at the legs, dabs to the on side
well forward, gets over it and smothers any turn
again on the front foot and defends to the on side
gets forward, then back as the shorter ball on the legs is punched down the ground to long on
just short on line, stands tall and strokes through the line to the off
short again, back, pushes to the off
shortish again, gets back and ounches that to the cover sweeper for his maiden 50 off 64 balls
being kept on the back foot, leg cutter cramps him up a bit
on the back foot, this time the off cutter has him in slight difficulty, outside half of the bat to the off
fuller ball, drives very firmly to a wide long off
back again, and the reason for the early drinks was a call from Nature for de Villiers, pushed to the off
outside off, drives to cover
well forward, drives, edge, Utseya goes to ground as Taibu puts that down, difficult chance as it defelected down, hit the gloves in the fingers and that was that
drives this time and gets the full bat to it, goes to long off
just outside off, forces a bit and drags that to the on side
all defensive from the front foot
width given, drives, not timed, ball goes no where
all defensive, just short of length but on line
strokes this off the front foot, runs it past the bowler
just slight width, gets the big forward stroke to cover
all defensive, gets a slight edge wide of the keeper, but was along the ground
well forward, stroked from length to the off
flighted up, drives down the ground to long off
loopy ball, gets forward, waits well and runs that past the gully
all defensive as he gets well forward and over it
defends from length to the bowler
uses his feet, gets to the pitch and stroked to the man at deep cover
all defensive toi the off
starts well again, keeping his length and line and pace as keeps the batsman on the front foot
all defensive again, line is perfect
slightly outside off, brings a more agressive push past the cover
oh dear, done so well, drops that short and has to fetch, high and handsome over midwicket
back on line, defends
well forward, defends to cover
stroked to the off
thats huge de Villiers down the pitch and sends that over the rope, over stands, into the car park
stroked down the ground to long off
looped up, drives that with excessive force, races wide of the sweeper
drives down the ground to long off
drives the fuller ball to long on
worked off the legs to deep square leg, they look for two but decide against it
left right hander causing problems, that is now leg side to the left hander, nudges to fine leg
leg side to right hander, worked forward of square leg
flicked off the legs, standing up in the crease, wide of fine leg
line and length, defends to the off
works that from the back foot, open face wide of the gully
well forward, defends
shuffles down and drives to long off
uses the feet and thats another one in the car park
makes room to the leg, swings, but forcing loses all timing, gets bat on it to long on
now it is Morkels turn, foot down the pitch and smashes that flat over a ducking bowlers head
good cricket here from Morkel, follows the six with a dab to the off for a quick run
full blooded drive into the ground, back at the bowler who somehow gets a hand to it and it sticks
shuffled down, fired very wide of the off
drives down the ground wide of long off who has a lot do, but keeps them to two
that is huge, swung it away wide of long on, and nearly clears the very high stands, catches the corner and goes off to the tennis courts
defends to the off
well forward, nice line and length, defends
flighted ball on the spot, defended
flighted again, just enough width to nudge to the off
defends to the on side, quick run
defends to the off
oversteps and runs it wide of the cover
all defensive as he flights that into the off, even though he has been punished, still preparded to throw it up
on the back foot, nudges to the off
fires into the legs, worked round the corner to fine leg
stroked forward to the off
pushed into the off side for a quick run
gets back, makes room to leg and flat bats that down the ground, long on does well
runs that off the legs to wide square leg
thats huge and goes well over cow corner and it is out of the ground, it has had enough punishment and will be replaced
defends to the off
leg stump line, flicks very fine to fine leg
drives firmly straight at midwicket
defends to the off
defends to the off
outside off, shortish, back and dabs down to third man
fuller ball, stroked towards the cover sweeper
short ball and that is whipped square from the front foot, just short of another maximum
line and length is treated with respect and pushed to the off
leg side wide
well forward, defends to the off
full outside off, goes after that on the drive but gets an inside edge and very well taken by an excited Taibu
full on the off, stroked wide of extra cover who does get around
full on the off, Pollock strokes that towards extra cover
outside off, almiost a wide, goes after that cutting to the sweeper
outside off, stands tall on the back foot and punches wide of the sweeper
slower ball in the arc and that is lofted well over midwicket, takes two bounces to cross the boundary
shortish ball, gets back and on the toes to get over the ball, chops that just forward of the cover sweeper
gets one just on the off, short of length, looks to run that to third man, opens the face too much as he plays from the crease, gets the edge and another catch by Taibu standing up
gets a full ball on the legs, clips wide of midwicket for an easy two
just short outside off, cuts close to the body and nearly another catch at the wicket
fuller ball on line, forward, pushed into the on side
outside off, touch short and is again beaten on the cut too close to the body, Taibu fumbles this one
outside off, fuller, strokes the drive to the sweeper
just on the off, drives on the up straight at cover
fullish ball, touch straight but well played in the V, runs that down to long on
full on the off and is driven square where the sweeper gets across to cut off
full on the off, drives firmly without any timing, enough on it to go to long off
the sixes are getting bigger and bigger, huge lofted drive miles over long on to go to hundred and that ball just might not come back
ball does come back from the car park and is spanked down the ground to long off
yorker is well dug out towards the sweeper, seeing the ball like a football now
Outside off, short, cuts that well forward of the sweeper, they decide on a second but the return from Maruma is perfect and TV has him well short
All defensive as he receives a line and length ball first up
drives to long on
full on the off, goes down the ground from the front foot
wide outside leg
line and length, defends to the off
into the legs, dabs to the on side to give de Villiers the strike
and strike he does, crashes the drive with timing right through the legs of extra cover
full on the legs, slower ball does it as de Villiers mistimes down the ground for long on to take a comfortable catch, what an innings
slow off stump full toss is driven straight at extra cover who this time does gather cleanly
on line, pace off it again, dabs to the on side
just on the off, left hander strokes gently from the front foot down towards the long off
gets a beauty, pitched on line, leaves him on the angle, well beaten
overpitched and it takes a good stop from long on to save the four
pushes to the off, vd Wath sets off, sent back and just beats the return to the bowlers end
fullish on the leg side, dabs just behind square leg
short but on line, van der Wath pulls from the front foot, does not complete the shot, sends it high and forward of the deep midwicket who takes a comfortable catch
short at the legs, pulls away to the off, high and straight at the deep square leg, oh dear Matsikenyeri puts a simple chance down
strokes down the ground to long off
slow ball is nudged to the leg side
WHAT A CATCH, slower ball outside the off, too short, crashes the cut wide of point who takes off, outstretched arm and that is a great catch from the 12th man Dabengwa
gets forward and chips the cover
runs that down the ground to a deep mid-off
fullish on the off, slow ball, Ntini goes after that, not timed, gets under it a bit and sends the catch to the long off coming in off the boundary
fullish ball on the off is well driven towards extra cover
full on the off, drives firmly wide of the long off, easy two taken
in the arc outside off, lofted well over long on
full on the off, looks to clear the ropes again, this time dabengwa, has just taken a blinder at point, puts down a very simple catch at long on
drives outside off, edges, taken on the bounce bt Taibu going wide on the off
thats is pulled down the leg side of the left hander
full toss wide outside off is driven to long off
slower ball on the off is chipped towards the long on, lands well short of the advancing player
drives along the ground to long on
full, again the pace is taken off, drags the drive to a wide long on, brings out a good diving save
slow again, waits for it and then easily clears the long on boundary
very slow ball, that is mistimed to deep square leg
full yorker to end the innings, batsman digs it out to the off, but no chance of a run

inn2.comm: left alone outside off as Pollock starts in his normal fashion
Outside off and again not shot as that leaves him
comes down the pitch to get to the ball, defends to the off
well up to the bat, drives, thick edge very well fielded by Duminy at gully
well forward, defends to the off
line and length, defends down the pitch to end the over, with the help of Duminy, of a maiden
gets forward to the angled ball, drives, angle gets the edge and stops the lbw appeal short
too short, width, slaps that away ahead of thrid man, good shot
angled into the legs, flicks, beaten into the pads
well forward outside off padding up, ball cuts back, appeal for the no shot, may have been too high and Barbour agrees
shot, overpitched, bang, good stride, good hands, nice timing, races past cover
left alone outside off, this time it does not cut back
well forward, defends to the off
touch shorter on the off, stands tall, punched to extra cover
well forward, off cutter gets the inside edge into the pads
outside off, touch short, gets on top of it, punches to the off, maybe played a little late, hits it into the pitch just in front of him
left alone outside off
line and length and that makes maiden number two for Pollock
angled in, touch short, defends
thats too short, stands up and drives straight from the back foot
defends this from just outside off, had to harry onto the back foot
thats too short, angled at the legs and dispatched to square leg
on the back foot, defends
better length and line, defends from the crease
too full, width, drives on the up and easily beats the cover
width and length and another good looking forceful cover drive
back onto length, defends to the off
full, but a touch on the legs, whipped through the mid wicket area
drives again, slower ball has him dragging that to the on side
Ntini off early, starts on line, defends to the off
leg stump line, wants to work to leg side, beaten into the pad
line and length, pushes back down the pitch
touch short, defends from the back foot
short, tries to pull from the front foot, late on the shot, ends up striking it straight down the ground, Morkel does get fingers to it
worked off the legs, from the back foot to the on side
outside off, full, slashing drive gets the thick outside edge over gully to third man
defends down the ground
just on the off, no real movement for Pollock today, defends to the off
on the back foot, hits that hard into the ground and to cover
no width, good length equates to defence
Pollock not giving any room now, defends to the off
leg side line, clips the pad towards where a leg gully may have been
on the back foot, defends off the body to the on side
a beauty, pitched on off, left him and bounced off back of a length, well and truely beaten
carefully defended standing up in the crease
well forward covers any movement, defends to the off
great over from Morkel, defends line and length to the off
shortish on the legs, whipped away forward of fine leg
gets it back to the channel just on the off, defends
line and length, gets forward, defends to the off
full and straight, lofted drive over pollocks head, more of a chip, stops as it lands
just outside off, that did seem to move away, outside half of bat, runs to cover
fullish on the off, drives straight, mid-off cuts that off after a slight chase
line and short of length, defends
forward on the off, runs what he thinks is wide of Duminy at gully, sets off, sent back, is dead but Duminy misses with Sibanda stranded halfway down the pitch
defends to the off and gets a loud NO from his partner
slight pressure brings out the false shot, swing away on the drive outside off, beaten
angled into the legs, touch short, that cuts back, inside edge into the pad to the on side
that slips way outside the off
back on that length just short on and about the off
Ntini replaces Pollock, starts too short, punched into the off side
defends a better length and line to the off
just on the off, angled in, defends to the off
too short, leg stump, easy pickings, put away at deep midwicket
short again but directed into the body, defends to the off
too short, leg side, Ntini has lost it a bit, smashed away from a good player off the back foot
well forward on the off, gets over the slightly short ball
line and length, takes no chances and defends
that is well played, pitched off, leaving him, well forward and over that
pressure again brings the forceful drive, thick edge down to a wide third man
well forward, defends to the off
outside off, well forward, open face to Duminy at gully and that is sloppy, casual pickup leads to a miss
on line drives straight, Ntini gets most of the hand on it and stops a few runs with that
just on the off, better length from ntini, defends to the off
full again, stroked down the pitch, easy pick up for Ntini
too short again, off the back foot and punches the drive past cover
short outside off and that is trashed away past midwicket
short again, almost saying I dont believe the other shots, but it is repeated, this time with authority over mid-on
SHOT, full, straight, gets the foot to the pitch and sends thats with interest back over Morkels head
crowd loving this, a spanking coverdrive beats a wishfull dive at cover, lovely to watch
Morkel has the last laugh, one just outside off, goes on the drive again, foot not there this time, nice bounce takes the outside edge to de Villiers
full on the off, gets forward, has to play, pushes to the off
left alone outside off
good line outside off, fullish as Taylor tries to cut, too full for that, beaten
well forward, this time defends with the straight bat, rolls it to the off
outside off, drives behind square, morne Morkel slides in from third man, does well and they have to hurry the second
just on the off, slight away movement, defends away from the body, no foot movement
shuffles to the off, defends to the off
and again, a little shuffle across to get into line, defends to the off
starts well, just on the off, defends down the pitch
just full, drives firmly, in the air back at the bowler, knee high, can not hold on to the caught and bowled
full just on off, thats launched high and straight, too much under it, rolls about a meter after pitching, mid-off back to collect
just short of length, punched not timed towards cover
bouncer flies through shoulder high, taken high by de Villiers, finger from ump goes up, Thats one for the over
just short of length, defends from line to the off
left alone outside off
just on the off, good channel ball, defends to the off
well forward on the off, defends to cover
well forward again, feet could move a bit better, pushes away from the body to gap at cover
just too full and width, lovely forcing drive
back to the channel, defends to the off
left alone outside off
pushes from line to the off
just a touch short alows him time to tun that to third man
in the slot, lofted well to long-on, just clears the boundary
touch shorter ball, on line, defends to the on side
good recovery from vd Wath, defends from length to the off
just on the off, length, defends to the off
well forward, plays towards cover
line and length, defends to the off
short outside off, cuts, beaten
outside off, forward, fairly firmly played into the ground and on the bounce to backward point
slips that down the leg side, flicked to the long leg boundary
right on the mark brings out a big stride and a forward defence, gets well over that
outside off, too full, crashes the drive through the covers
outside off, that goes away with the arm, gets forward put then pushes at it, gets the edge to de Villiers
that must have got stuck in the hand, a huge off side wide
just on the off, gets forward defending
good ball, again movement away with the arm, pushes forward and is beaten
short and width outside off, taibu wont miss out ion those gifts, taken on the cut behind backward point
line and length, defends to the off
staying on that line and length just on or outside off, defends
once again he is in the channel, taibu gets the front foot well across as he defends
fuller ball on the off, stroked down the pitch, Philander can just not get a hand to that, deflects with the fingers wide of mid-off
well forward on the off, his feet do move well, gets it right on line defending
touch short outside off, lofted drive over mid-off
very wide, drives away from the body, comes off the bottom edge of the bat, beats a diving de Villiers
leg stump line, slower ball, off the pads to the on side
outside off, and gently run to third man, rortating the strike well today
as does Taibu, on line and length, nudges into the gap at cover
well forward on the off, drives gently wide of the sweeper
short, leg side, pulls well behind square, Ntini does well from fine leg but after sliding in he gets hands to it, slides past as the ball ball trickles into the boundary
outside off, drives square
just outside off, short of length, defends to the off
overpitched, cracking square drive, third man tried in vain as the ball beats him to the cut off
line and length is defended towards the backward point
taylor doing the right thing now, gives the strike to Taibu as he runs that to third man
fullish on the off, that is stroked just wide of the cover
leg side ball is worked gently off the legs towards long leg
outside off, touch short, not forcing runs that wide of gully for Ntini to race around from thrid man
outside off, pretty straight and pushed into the off for another single
touch short, gets back and angles that from the face towards the third man
defends to the off, quick run not taken, Taylor shouts NOOO
they take the run this time, worked off the legs
singles now coming very easy for Zimbabwe
defends to the off
stays in the channel and gets the defence from Taylor
using his feet, lofted well over the bowlers head, catch is the call, but that must have been for someone in the crowd
just outside off, runs that down toward third man
better length, just does not hit that spot consistently
lets that slip down the leg side, helped on its way towards the fine leg, vd Wath not happy with that
outside off, gets well forward, soft hands to the off, quick run
Taylor now with the softhands to the off, easy single from Taibu racing through
shortish outside off, cuts firmly into the ground and to point
drives traight to long on, oh dear Ntini makes a complete mess of that, slips through and nearly goes to the boundary
leg side, off the pad behind square
cuts firmly but the sweeper does very well to save that inches from the boundary rope, saves one run
dabs from the pads to the on side
well forward, nudges to the off
flighted on the off, pushes forward straight at cover
Pollock comes back and gets a little dab cut going straight at gully
outside off, just outside off, worked down towards third man
pushed from the front foot to the on side
looking to milk Pollock slowly, runs that with the open face to thrid man
leg side and flicked off the legs to fine leg
nearly run a ball from Pollock by just nudging it around, worked down to third man
flighted up, defends down the pitch
flighted again, plays that slighty later, runs it wide of the bowler
leg side ball fired in
follows the wide by overstepping
well forward, just works it into the gap at midwicket
all defenesive, as he find the spot just outside off turning back
too straight, plays late with the turn towards the on side, easy run taken
gets forward to one a touch straight, stands up as he takes the bounce and works that to square leg, enough on ot to get the second
full and straight, drives down the ground. Pollock can not get a hand to it, but M Morkel at long on does get across
quicket ball gets up a bit, hits high on the bat as he comes forward, defends to the on side
fuller on the legs and that is dabbed into the leg side for an easy quick run
full on the legs and gently stroked from the crease towards long on
staying on the legs has him defending to the on side
turn and bounce from outside the off, well over that, high off the outside half to a surprised Morkel at gully
well forward to cover that bounce, smothers any turn as well
shorter ball, straight, turned round the corner for his fifty
thats just far too short and Taylor helps himself to an easy pulled boundary
short again, thats is whipped to the on side from the front foot, but only finds the deep midwicket
slightly fuller ball, but leg stump line is turned away with the spin
happy to work the ball into gaps as he turns that towards the gap at midwicket
line and length, may have been an hint of reverse swing, defends to the on side
just outside off, plays late with the open face, runs that to third man
fullish ball on the off and that is driven wide of the sweeper who cuts off but can not stop the second run
line and length, again a hint of reverse, defends to the on side
gets well forward, nearly moving to the off, stroked down the ground to long on
flighted on the off, drives, but good flight has him driving over the ball
flighted again, strokes down the pitch to the bowler
good flight again, has him forward and pushing to the on side
slips in a short ball outside off, thats a gift, slashes the cut behind square
flighted again, drives down the pitch, bowler dives but does not collect cleanly
flighted, drives down the ground towards long off
well forward on the off, defends
well forward, nudges to the off
keeps the line and length, waiting for the batsman to make a mistake, defends to the off
stays just on the off, nice defensive length gets the defensive push
touch too full, but on line, stroked doen the ground to a deep mid-off
flighted up on the off, gets forward defends
slightly leg side is chipped towards and short of deep midwicket
defends the flighted ball that is fullish to the on side
flatter ball maybe arm ball at the legs, goes to clear midwicket but Dumniy jumping to his left gets two hands to it and holds on to a good catch
flighted up on the off, wants to have a look first, defends down the pitch
had a good enough look he thinks, flighted up on the off and lofted back down the leg side clearing long on with a lot to spare
just outside off, touch short, easy run down to third man
leg stump full toss, put away wide of a diving long on
line and length gets him half forward defending to the on side
yorker well dug out to the off, NOOO from taibu as he sees Duminy pounch
just short of length, angled in, straightens and thats well bowled with the older ball beating the edge
well forward on the off, open face runs that well forward of third man with time to spare to take the second
line and length, a touch of away movement off the seam, defends to the off, de Villiers liked that
slower ball is slid down the leg and helped on its way towards long leg
outside off, touch short, gets back and cuts very late, de Villiers tries to dive but too wide
better line, stroked back down the pitch, vd Wath gets a hand to it
leg side, flicked off the hips down to fine leg
Bodi moved to well forward of square leg, trap set, and he falls for it, touch short on the legs, goes after it, gets it high on the bat with Bodi hardly having to move as he takes it comfortably
fullish on the off, defends to the off
just outside off, tries to work that to fine leg, gets too much bat as he directs it to backward point
over the wicket across the left hander who pushes back at Philander
outside off, forward, pushes towards point
outside off, slog sweeps that high to cow corner, Bodi does very well to keep that from crossing the boundary, jumping high and flicking the ball back into play
full toss on the off, stroked down the ground to long off
full on the off, stroked to the off
yorker well directed and well kept out

outside off angled across, huge swing, near miss, off the toe of the bat towards mid-off, Williams sets off, Smith gathers, underarms into the stumps, well short and for once TV replay is not required
outside off, touch short, cuts but bottom edges to Duminy at gully
cuts again, cleanly this time, beats gully but not third man
outside off, full, drives, thick edge over gully, fine leg not going to get to that
full at the legs, clips firmly down to long on
full on the legs, plays slightly across the line, wide of long on who attacks well and keeps them to one, good fielding from Morkel
leg stump line, flicks fine, fine leg up in the circle, easy runs there if you bowl leg side
fuller ball, better off line, strokes across the line to long on
drives straight and wide of long off, these two are quick, easy two runs
full, dabs to the on side for another quick run
full again, almost yorker, that is firmly dug out to long on, must be a big bat that
outside off, well forward, opens the blade and runs it to third man
just outside off, makes room to the leg, chops that down to third man
outside off, stand and deliver, flat bats that past a deep mid-off
goes across the line and drives towards long on
full ball at the legs, gets the bat to it, bit edgy, but runs wide of the midwicket
third man comes up, three on the leg side boundary, yorker is fired in and dug out back at Pollock
full ball at the legs, makes room to the leg and drives firmly to the long off who does well getting across and gets the ball back in to stop the second
full on the off, crashing drive, but brilliant by Smith at extra cover, diving across with two hands, great fielding from the captain
full on the off, drives to Smith again, not timed and easy pickup, but good running too
full again, keeping it up to the bat, slices the drive wide of the sweeper who has a bit to do
yorker is dug out and left in the crease, quick run as Ntini follows up, direct underarm but they get through
great yorker again, this time rolls back at Ntini and no chance of a run
straight and full, plays back firmly to Ntini who gets a hand on it but can not stop it cleanly, best over of the series for Ntini
stays straight, pushes to the off, soft hands this time to get the run
makes room to the leg, Pollock follows him, stroked back down the pitch, just too straight for Pollock to get hands on
leg side again, right up there, leg bye taken to square leg
fired into the leg stump, makes room and lofts that to the on side, does not make clean contact and sends it straight to van der Wath at long on
well forward on the off, gets the pad as he tries to work that
fullish on the legs, dabs to the on side
what ever fast bowler wants to see, the top of the off stump being hit and sent spinning, angled in just on legth, Brent gets forwatd but the ball is through him before any defence got in the way
good bowling from Ntini, niot sure where he has been, defends to the off
and again, on line, just on length, no room but to push to the off
full on the legs, gets bat to that as he works it to midwicket
full and on line, stroked down the ground for his career best
well forward, pushes to the off, quick run taken
touch short on the off, lofted across the line between deep wide midwicket and long on
full on the legs, dugs out to the on side
full leg stump yorker dug out to the on side, not much more he could do with that
yorker again, just outside off, beaten, de Villiers gathers, Taibu comes, de Villiers is wide, but the little man may have been in anyway
full on the legs, goes down the ground to long on
dug out to the on side
stays on line, just short, tries a flick sweep, beaten
digs out the full ball to the on side
full, on line, defends to Ntini
again he gets a very full ball that is stroked to the off
and he gets it, his first 100, full, slightly leg side, dabs towards a deep mid-on, and the crowd errupts, Smith runs in from mid-off and gives taibu a weldone tap on the back, thats good to see
tries another little flick sweep over the keepers head, but instead of bat he collects it behind the head
outside off, males room to the leg side and slashes that on the drive behind point
makes room again but this time drives straight at the deep mid-off
outside off, just short, flat bats that down the ground to mid-off
leg side, flicks, but off the pad to the on side
full at the legs, stroked out to the on side and fittingly taibu will take the last ball
touch short and outside off, goes over the off side inner ring, cut off by the sweeper to bring the match and series to an end
